          <title>
            <string language="en">Universal indicator</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Universalanzeige</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Indicateur universel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Indicador universal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Indicatore universale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καθολικός δείκτης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Indicador universal</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the change in colour in universal indicators when dipped in different acids and alkalis.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">neutral substance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">strongly acidic substance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">strongly alkaline substance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">universal indicator</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">weakly acidic substance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">weakly alkaline substance</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Änderung in der Farbe 
in den Universalanzeigen, wenn sie in den unterschiedlichen Säuren 
und in den Alkalien eingetaucht wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre le changement de la 
couleur dans les indicateurs universels une fois plongée dans 
différents acides et alcalis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a mudança na cor em 
indicadores universais quando mergulhada em ácidos e em alcalóides 
diferentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il cambiamento a 
colori in indicatori universali una volta tuffata in acidi ed alcali 
differenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την αλλαγή στο χρώμα 
στους καθολικούς δείκτες όταν βυθίζονται στα διαφορετικά οξέα 
και τα αλκάλια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el cambio en color en 
indicadores universales cuando está sumergida en diversos ácidos y 
álcalis.</string>
          </description>
